ComicInfo.Summary: Forever Evil: Blight: The Battle of Nanda Parbat [Part 17 of 18]: Pandora must defeat Felix Faust and Nick Necro, who have imprisoned most of the world's most powerful mages and are using them as fuel for their own sorcery.
ComicInfo.Title: Forever Evil: Blight: The Battle of Nanda Parbat [Part 17 of 18]
